title: Glasgow
name: Glasgow Grand Central
directions: Adjoins onto the side of Central Station

reviews.content: Good location on the edge of the French Quarter, but the hotel is worn and lacks attractiveness. The lobby bar looks like it belongs in a budget motel. The paint on the bathroom door in our room, and that of our fellow travelers, was quite chipped. We have stayed in other Doubletree Hotels and fell well short of the standard of the others. We were only staying 2 nights so we didn't move hotels, but our fellow travelers who were staying in New Orleans 2 more nights moved to another hotel.
reviews.author: Nella Ratke

description: This grandiose olde worlde railway hotel - once one of the city's most prestigious hotels - has been recently refurbished and restored to its former glory.
